mention.text: the Chinese and North Korean military
two of these large military drones
two unmanned aerial vehicles -LRB- UAVs -RRB- to Misawa Air Base as early as late May , The Yomiuri Shimbun reports
a senior official source at Japan
an operational altitude of up to 18,000 meters
